name: Single Undead Portraits
description: If you would like to join the side of the gnarly and grotesque, send us a head shot of yourself or the victim and you/they can be forever undead. An image of 150 pixels or larger would be best for maximum shock. Please upload your image to tinypic, imagurl, photobucket, flickr or where ever we can access it and include the link to the image in the 'note to seller' section on the Paypal order. You will find this link directly under your shipping address on the "review your information" Paypal screen. If you miss this step - please send us an email with you image. Make sure to include an email where we will return your image. All images will be 8x10 at 2400 pixels x 3000 pixels ready for you to do what ever you want with the image! Be creative, it's now your undead mug to show off to the world! Some customers have made framed prints, others make t-shirts! It would be awesome to see what you end up doing with that image. Please feel free to share with us on our Facebook page! Disclaimer: By purchasing this portrait you allow us creative freedom in creating your zombie(s). We do this because just like when the real zombie apocalypse happens nobody really knows how they will end up. It's the freakin' end of the world! No hard feelings. However, if you are concerned about the final product you can request it to be either bloody or not so bloody in the note to seller along with your image link. Thanks!

name: Dreadfully Dire Duo Portraits
